name: La Promenade Mall
features: A modern lifestyle mall featuring a variety of retail outlets, dining options, a supermarket, and office spaces. It is part of the La Promenade mixed development by Hock Seng Lee Berhad.
address: No.1, HSL Tower, Lorong La Promenade 2, Kuching-Samarahan Expressway, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak, Malaysia.

name: The Summer Shopping Mall
features: The first shopping mall in Kota Samarahan, offering a range of retail shops, dining options, and entertainment facilities. It houses tenants like Emart Supermarket and Parkson Department Store
address: Lot 7455, Block 1, Jalan Datuk Mohammad Musa, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Aiman Mall
features: Halal Indian Muslim restaurant known for rich and spicy mutton curry; also offers naan and other Indian dishes.
